ygData.subject: Re: Red Headband Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: I dont think they are worth doing for somthing to wear there are better items you can get to wear. but they are worth collecting the items when you are
ygData.messageBody:
I dont think they are worth doing for somthing to wear there are better
items you can get to wear. but they are worth collecting the items when you
are adventuring in the areas they are found.

Kizmet Bayashi
Monk of the 32nd
E. Marr


----- Original Message -----
From: Imari J. A. Dellimore <ijad@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 1999 3:47 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Red Headband Quest


> From: "Imari J. A. Dellimore" <ijad@...>
>
> Are the headbands and sash quests worth it? Is the Ac/stat bonus merit
> the time it takes to get these items? I was just wondering because I met a
> level 35 monk who says she never did any of the quests and feels that the
> items given are not worth the trouble.
>
>
>
